website_summaries.verdict: A hiker for women that has top-notch comfort and attractive aesthetics accurately describes Merrell’s Siren Edge Q2. A footgear with a remarkably true-to-size fit but still having a spacious enough toe box also points heavily to this shoe. That said, its allegedly flimsy sole might be considered as something of a disappointment by some. In the end, the Merrell Siren Edge Q2 is a fantastic piece in almost every area. Those who shun its letdown of a sole may choose from the brands other sturdier offerings, though.
pros: This Merrell hiking shoe runs true to size, based on a considerable number of reports
Its high level of comfort wowed numerous wearers
The Merrell women’s Siren Edge Q2 hiker was applauded by many for having fun color schemes
Several reviewers commended the shoe’s spacious toe box
Some owners found the Siren Edge Q2 unbelievably lightweight
It didn’t take a couple of patrons too long to break in this low-top hiking gear
This footwear deeply impressed a user with its superbly grippy M-Select Grip outsole
Merrell offers this shoe in multiple colorways
This hiker can be purchased at a budget-friendly price
cons: An owner suffering from plantar fasciitis didn’t find the shoe’s sole sturdy enough

customer_reviews.title: Get a half size larger than normal if you want to wear thick socks
customer_reviews.text: Merrell shoes comfortable as always and a really reliable brand. I always buy a half size bigger than what I normally take as Merrell sometimes don't run as big as other brands.. consider the sizing particularly if you want to wear thick socks. They usually last me about 10 years of daily dog walking and I've always been pleased with them. I never need to break these shoes in in as they always are comfortable from day one.
customer_reviews.author: Beverley hilton

customer_reviews.title: Really comfy light weight shoe for summer/ everyday walking
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfy and for my slightly wide feet fit really well - enough space for an insert I have to wear too but don’t feel loose even without it. They’re more like trainers than a traditional walking shoe and so are very light weight but the grip feels good and so will be good for proper walking if it’s not wet or too muddy. I would have preferred them to be waterproof but decided to go for these ones after reading the reviews for the waterproof ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lou C

customer_reviews.title: they fit and are waterproof
customer_reviews.text: They fit well and have a loose insole under which to place my orthotics. Sole well cushioned for walking on rough ground and kept out water during heavy downpour. Lightweight for summer walking.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Gave me blisters
customer_reviews.text: I not sure these are genuine as the back of the shoe has a really hard section that digs into your heels. I bought another pair, same make difference design from a shop and it fits like a glove..
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline A

customer_reviews.title: Returned due to sizing
customer_reviews.text: I love Merrell footware and have bought various over the years, as they design really well for women's feet. I'm a 41 and usually their 7/7.5 fits really well. These 7.5 I returned as unfortunately they were very tight around the centre of the foot and too loose / wide at the top - even for a running shoe, which needs to have more space than most. Unfortunately the next size up wasn't in stock.
customer_reviews.author: PeacheyStar

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully comfortable but do not wear well
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully comfortable but disappointed with wear after a year. I would expect more from an expensive product. I have complained direct to Merrell.
customer_reviews.author: GMann

customer_reviews.title: fine but quality not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: Colour is more beige than grey- so look like elderly person's shoes. Fine for dog walking but not as cushioned as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Eminam

customer_reviews.title: Look a bit plasticky
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, not as nice as other Merrells and almost certainly won't last as long. The heel cup sits higher than normal and rubs, never had that before in a Merrell but too late to send them back now.
customer_reviews.author: T Pim

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: My neighbour recommended Merrell walking shoes, and said they were true to size. I normally wear size 6, so that is what I bought - much too small. As Merrell do half sizes, I bought 6.5 - OK, but would have hurt my toes on a long walk. So I bought size 7 - perfect! They have lots of room around the toes, while still gripping at the heel, and not feeling sloppy. I would highly recommend these shoes, and luckily the returns were free.
customer_reviews.author: paperback reader

customer_reviews.title: I did not know ordering shoes on internet could be so painless
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling with trainers which were way past their sell date due to lockdown. This is the first time I have ordered shoes online and the experience is first rate. I know merrells normally got me well and these are soo comfy and supportive whilst being light. Great shoe, great price
customer_reviews.author: GadgetDad

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I walk a lot! I’ve always bought Merrells Chameleon Wrap Slams as I know my size and that they will fit me perfectly, 100% of the time. This time I bought these different Merrells, as I liked the colour & style. I was really pleasantly surprised at the superb fit & I immediately went on a three mile walk... no rubbing! No blisters & no sore spots! Definitely worth the money & I will continue to buy these amazing walking shoes for as long as they keep the quality I’ve grown to expect from the grand.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are a really good fit and extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ann Jones

customer_reviews.title: Pretty - not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and cool looking shoes, however if you want a water resistant shoe, this is not the one! I was disappointed when it got wet and I only walked on wet grass. I will keep it because it’s the most comfortable pair of shoes I own. Size is on the bigger side, I ordered 4.5 and 4 would have been enough. All in all it’s a very good shoe, but it’s not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Was a bit large and plastic
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice from far away and on photos, but up close it is just a cheap looking plastic finish trainer. Would not have bought it had I seen it in a shop. Happy about prime wardrobe buy because I did not even have to pay for it, just sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Emese Sz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes and bought them to help with my flat feet pain - whilst they look lovely and are very comfortable the trim on the toe has already started to peel off - only had them a few weeks! It looks cheap and nasty. Someone asked if they were from Morrison’s as the M on the front is similar to Morrison’s logo! Not quite what I wanted for my first pair of Morrels!!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Cook

customer_reviews.title: Not convinced they are genuine
customer_reviews.text: Not convinced these are genuine Merrels. Bought on August 22nd this year and having to throw them away today on 20th October as they are falling apart. £60 wasted.. shoes that I’ve bought elsewhere cheaper lasted longer than these and I’m just doing normal wear not even been anywhere but road walks. Out of return window .. gutted. I was led to believe by many people Merrell is a very good quality brand.. not seen it at all with these. Maybe I had a bad pair? Who knows? But I won’t be buying Merrell again.
customer_reviews.author: scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Hard, stiff heel
customer_reviews.text: Having previously had some Merrell walking trainers that were really comfortable I was disappointed with these. The heel is quite stiff and hard, lacking the soft padding of my previous pair. I was worried they would rub and give me blisters on my heels so have returned. Apart from that the fit is great, my normal size was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Not the best Merrells I've owned
customer_reviews.text: These look great although slightly plastic looking and are incredibly rigid. I suffered with blisters for a few weeks before confidently going plaster and pain free. I'm happy with them now but I was so disappointed when I first started working out in them.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Great stylish walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace a near identical pair which I’ve had for years so I knew they would be a great deal! Amazon described them as waterproof which they aren’t, but I obviously knew that! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will do the job I guess
customer_reviews.text: It was lightweight which is helpful. Disappointed However that it felt a bit thin and looks a bit cheap. I guess they’ll get covered in mud from walking about in the woods etc but here’s a fine line between a little hit weight shoe and feeling a bit cheaply stuck together. Except more from merely tbh
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes - fraction of the price you would pay in typical outdoor shops. I have wide feet & I find these to be a great fit - my last pair lasted me years & went miles with me :) would recommend
customer_reviews.author: DoUnoWot

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfortable shoes. Waterproof to a degree. Out in very heavy rain my socks were a little wet at my toes. Overall very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: NancyElizabethAlice

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected in a Merrell
customer_reviews.text: These are not as sturdy as my other Merrells however they are a comfy pair of trainers/shoes that I will be able to wear for general use -dog walking 2-3 so for the price they are very good value. I would not 'hike' in them
customer_reviews.author: brigid simpson

customer_reviews.title: Hard heels!
customer_reviews.text: The heel of the trainer is very hard. I ended up with blisters on both heels on the first day using for walking. I had to buy another pair of trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian McNabb

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I like that they fit perfectly, my last few pairs of Merrels were tight fit and these tick of all the boxes , they are the best and the cheapest I bought this year, I bought 3 pairs of boots 3times the price and all too small, I ordered two pairs of these by mistake but happy to keep them
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy
customer_reviews.text: Well made shoes but really hard on the foot, not comfortable at all. Shame good shoes but not as good as other Merrell shoes
customer_reviews.author: SAFC1973

customer_reviews.title: Great wee shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice wee lightweight shoe. Good enough grip for what I wanted and keep the foot cool. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Copland

customer_reviews.title: ? Fake
customer_reviews.text: The eyelets at the top of the shoe have already come away from the shoe. I've only had them since Thursday and worn them once. Comfy shoe but worried that it's a fake Merrell! I'll wait for response...
customer_reviews.author: miss nl deacon

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking well made shoes, but rubbed a little on the heel, so couldn't risk walking in them.
customer_reviews.author: Elrington

customer_reviews.title: Good for hard steady ground no good for bogey wet areas
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe but not water proof at all ok if you wear them on dry days
customer_reviews.author: ALAN J. 🖤🤍

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice colour lightweight and comfortable shoes. This is my third pair . Good price.
customer_reviews.author: HSJ

customer_reviews.title: Great look but practical
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for Christmas, but tried on to check fit etc
customer_reviews.author: Shez

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal grip, super comfort and the quality you expect from Merrell. Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of lightweight, safe walking shoes that would keep my feet cool on long, hot walks. First time out the shoes did 10k in blistering heat and I didn't notice I was wearing them. And they're stylish too. I'm so impressed I'm going to get a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Practical Mum

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!! 💚🤍🧡
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to get them, but they arrived at last...
customer_reviews.author: Lilly L-R

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my travels to Latin America, they were very comfortable and had great grip, but I bought them because they were meant to be waterproof! I walked through a shallow puddle and my feet got totally soaked, and even through dewy grass I ended up with my feet soaked! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: katherine lambert

customer_reviews.title: They cut the heels off you
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product but the heels are very hard and when I was walking today by the time I got home my 2 heels very raw almost bleeding and very sore. Normally these products are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Esther M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes; Great Service
customer_reviews.text: Really great pair of shoes- sturdy sole but flexible and love the colours plus practical rubber around the toe to protect the meshing. Price was great and they arrived a day earlier than expected so great service all round.
customer_reviews.author: D C Sweetman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and look great too. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: betty swain

customer_reviews.title: Walking trainer
customer_reviews.text: Good supporting trainer without being stiff. Got as a road walking shoe to replace a previous Merrill pair which were too small. I feel you need to go up a size in these trainers otherwise excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Helen W.

customer_reviews.title: True to size and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: comfortable as soon as I took them out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: kmary

customer_reviews.title: Supportive shoes for active people.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are exactly what I was looking for. Not too heavy going, supportive enough to help with a pulled ligament, really comfortable and excellant grip. I am really happy with them and recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No wearing in necessary
customer_reviews.text: I usually have great difficulty finding comfort. These are excellent and only needed a gentle wearing around the house for a day before wearing on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Mumsie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a replacement for my old Merrell walking shoes which are coming to the end of their life. As I expected they were a perfect fit and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Very hard and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very hard and uncomfortable. Not much of "bendy" sole. Can't recommend at all. Sent it back right away. It's a shame because it is very light.
customer_reviews.author: Aqua

customer_reviews.title: These shoes leak
customer_reviews.text: The right hand shoe leaks and has only done so since we have had rain after the very hot spell I am asking for a refund!
customer_reviews.author: G. Burn

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof but nice design overall
customer_reviews.text: Great colour and design but not waterproof, bit of a shame, within hours of walking on a field feet were wet! Not the reason one would buy hiking shoes...
customer_reviews.author: Lychee

customer_reviews.title: Could this be forwarded to Merrill as I’d like a refund.
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed with these shoes. They look good, fit well and I realise they are not goretex, but I was not prepared for my feet being permanently wet and cold. They seem to absorb even the lightest of rain and are thus NOT FIT FOR PURPOSE as walking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Caroline E Lang

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed that the two times I have worn these on damp grass dog walking they have been anything but waterproof. Front half of foot soaking wet.
customer_reviews.author: Mum

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy sole, perfect for strolls/walking/work when required, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I use them for work and very happy with my choice, long shifts with no issues with tired feet, much recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Agnieszka

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and all perfect, packed nicely, a fantastic light summer walking shoe. A really good price too the best I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t like to top coat
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the finish. The top coat felt as though it would peel and not last long. I returned these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the trainers, extremely comfortable and ideal for dog walking
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of trainers
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected - size fits perfectly. Very comfortable and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Miss S MacAlpine

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money, feels light on your feet, just love the colour too.
customer_reviews.author: Bev Worth

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, stylish, light. A+++++
customer_reviews.text: Soooo comfy. Really supports the foot. Very stylish looking. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Not at all waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These were very inferior to the merrells I have previously bought over the years. They were well made but the materials used were plasticky and cheap and they were completely unwaterproof. They seemed to absorb water at the first possibility so were totally not fit for purpose. They were light and comfortable and the soles gripped well but they looked cheap and were not very attractive. They did not have the usual merrell insole to support the instep and promote even wear so the sole was quite thin.
customer_reviews.author: izzy wizzy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stylish walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Stylish walking shoes, comfy on long walks. Tried and tested on multi terrain,- so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Rubyroo

customer_reviews.title: Merrells are always consistent
customer_reviews.text: I've lots of Merrell trainers and have never been disappointed. Great range of colours and designs, if they say waterproof, they are waterproof and the sizing is always consistent. Once you know your size, future purchases can be relied on.
customer_reviews.author: DeiryMe

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are the best walking shoes. Fit as expected and great price. Very happy shopper.
customer_reviews.author: Miz

product_meta.title: Merrell Women's Siren Edge Q2 Low Rise Hiking Boots
product_meta.description: This athletic hiker is engineered for the way women move, offering support, alignment, and gender-specific stability. Mesh and synthetic upper Metal hook and lacing eyelet for secure lacing Bellows tongue keeps debris out M select fresh antimicrobial agents reduces shoe odour kinetic fit tri insole is contoured like your foot and features triple zone arch support to provide light support Moulded nylon arch shank Q form 2 insole and midsole technology is gender-engineered for women to provide natural alignment and superior comfort M select grip outsole tunes each outsole with durable traction that grips when and where you need it 4.5mm lug depth.
